xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/799424-Buryong 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8R7XWIR1OCQTeP1z35dUr8jBg3U.jpg A minute of a life. Bored to death. What is life? A series of moving stills. "Buryong" captures sixty-seconds-in-a-life, Philippine-time. From mundane chores, to work, to scenes of domesticity, to killing time, we are asked to observe and meditate on these moments. A lot can happen in the span of a minute. An entire lifetime even. Buryong is an epistle to time and to boredom. This could be your minute; this could be your life. How are you spending it? Buryong
